entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 22. POP 30%
